description: A cross-functional team is a group of people with different functional expertise working toward a common goal. It may include people from finance, marketing, operations, and human resources departments. Typically, it includes employees from all levels of an organization. Members may also come from outside an organization.
name: Cross-Functional Collaboration

value: A cross-functional team is a group of people with different functional expertise working toward a common goal.
